property.name: text
property.value:
Cooperative Stationary Target Localization using Mutual-Information Based Control Optimization
The Optimizer actor takes particles ( that estimate the robot location probability distribution) and robot locations as inputs at time t and computes the optimal control inputs to robots, which will maximize the mutual information between the robot measurements and the target location distribution at time t+1.

entity.name: Gaussian
entity.doc: Create a sequence of gaussian random variables
